import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Home.css'; const Home = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [cars, setCars] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/cars') .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => { setCars(data); setLoading(false); }) .catch((err) => { console.error('Error fetching cars:', err); setLoading(false); }); }, []); return ( <> {/* First Hero Section */}

); }; export default Home;
